    If you are looking for an excellent quality chef knife, I would recommend this. The handle is comfortable to hold and it is a great option for color coding in a commercial kitchen. The blade is very firm and sharp. The price is excellent!

    Jean H. Posted on 01/18/2018

    A great affordable option for workhorse knives for a culinary arts program. My students love them, they sharpen well and are comfortable in hand. A+

    Derek C. from Healdsburg Unified School District Posted on 12/23/2017

    AWESOME! Very sharp so be careful, but this knife is WONDERFUL! Dull is not even a word when it comes to this knife. I'm sold completely! Highly Recommend!

    Madison L. Posted on 12/21/2017

    I FREAKING LOVE THESE KNIVES!!!!! I have had so many knives over the past 25 years and these are the best. Don't let the price fool you. I've had my set for 7 years now and they still look and cut like new. Holds an edge and very lightweight (I like that)

    Matthew H. from Country Dog Posted on 12/07/2017

    Okay, so when you get this knife, you know what you're getting. It's cheap, it's not going to replace an artisan chef knife, but it does it's job. It cuts stuff, very well. Though I don't use it in a professional setting, I use it pretty consistently, and it's kept its edge very well. The only negative is as it's stamped and sharp, occasionally it scrapes on the board and sounds like it might be cracking. It's not, but the sound does take a little getting used to.
